app_descript:
Brief:

Embark on a mystical journey with Inua, where you traverse the fabric of time itself to unearth links that bind together narratives separated by millennia. You'll lead characters through a rich tapestry of history, solving puzzles that span across various eras, to seek out the mythical Nanurluk, a polar bear of legend said to have roamed the earth 10,000 years ago.

  • üïí Temporal Exploration: Navigate through different epochs to piece together a grand historical puzzle üß©.

  • üåê Engaging Storytelling: Delve into a story inspired by the Franklin expedition and Inuit legends, crafted by expert storytellers and designers üìñ.
  • üé® Artistic Direction: Experience a visually stunning adventure, brought to life by the artistic prowess of Delphine Fourneau and the Klondike collective üñåÔ∏è.
  • üß© Interactive Puzzles: Engage in a thought-provoking gameplay where your actions and choices in the past affect the future ‚åõ.

Pros:
